entry.title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: USTH reduces manpower due to financial losses amid pandemic

media:group.media:title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: USTH reduces manpower due to financial losses amid pandemic
media:group.media:description:
The University of Santo Tomas (UST) Hospital has reduced its manpower to minimize its expenses and financial losses, amid the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic.
Subscribe to our YouTube channel for updates about the novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the Luzon-wide lockdown or the Enhanced Community Quarantine (ECQ).

entry.title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: Jinggoy Estrada released after alleged ECQ violations

media:group.media:title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: Jinggoy Estrada released after alleged ECQ violations
media:group.media:description:
Former senator Jinggoy Estrada has been released by the San Juan City Police after being brought to the police station on Sunday afternoon for allegedly violating quarantine protocols.

media:group.media:title: 24 Oras Weekend Express: May 3, 2020 [HD]
media:group.media:description:
Narito ang mga balitang ating tinutukan ngayong Linggo, May 3, 2020:
-Cellphone at ilang paninda, ninakaw sa tindahan
-Rider na nakainom, sugatan matapos sumemplang nang tangkaing tumakas sa checkpoint
-Regular temperature check, hiwa-hiwalay na pagkain at limitadong interaksyon, ipatutupad sa mga trabaho
-Mahigit 100, hinuli sa unang araw ng hard lockdown sa Tondo District 1
-Navotas, isasailalim sa extreme enhanced community quarantine mula May 6-15
-DILG Usec. Malaya: ECQ sa Metro Manila, posibleng 'di na i-extend matapos ang May 15
-Buntis na nakunan, nagpositibo sa COVID-19 kahit 'di lumalabas ng bahay
-International flights papasok sa bansa, suspendido muna hanggang May 9
-Residenteng pumanaw na, kabilang daw sa mga nakatanggap ng tulong sa Makati
-Ilang residente, nagrereklamo dahil wala umanong natatanggap na cash assistance
-Jinggoy Estrada, sinabing naka-facemask siya nang arestuhin sa paglabag sa ECQ habang namimigay ng relief goods
-Fun at educational activities ng celebrity moms at kids ngayong naka-quarantine
-Isang barangay, nagsagawa ng parada para sa kapistahan ng kanilang simbahan
-DOH tally as of May 3, 2020
-Pilates at home
Visit gmanews.tv/COVID19 for the latest updates on the coronavirus pandemic.
For Kapuso abroad, subscribe to GMA Pinoy TV (http://www.gmapinoytv.com/) for GMA programs.

media:group.media:title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: 6 medical staff from hospital in Bicol test positive for COVID-19

entry.title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: Concepcion, Tarlac still under enhanced community quarantine

media:group.media:title: GMA News COVID-19 Bulletin: Concepcion, Tarlac still under enhanced community quarantine
media:group.media:description:
